name: Doll Maker Dress Up!
description:
Tired of those boring dress up games? Well here's another one! Doll Maker Dress Up! Where you find yourself a nice looking doll, and you make her one! This game includes 5 whole different shirts, pants, and accessories!

Warning: Game might not be suitable for young children.

Want to support the game and it's creator? Check out her ko-fi!
